Class Figure

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.mprog.apps.hangman11079592.basemodel.Figure
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StickFigure

    public abstract class Figure
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract base figure for the Gameplay game
    Since:
    2015
